title: Senate unanimously passes tax deduction for cash tips
shortDescription: The unexpected voice vote comes as congressional Republicans work to pass legislation that would include a similar provision.

title: Biden was last screened for prostate cancer in 2014 before diagnosis
shortDescription: Joe Biden was never screened for prostate cancer during his four years as president, following medical recommendations for men 70 or older.

title: Trump meets with Republican lawmakers
shortDescription: President Donald Trump is working to clear out GOP opposition to his policy bill, meeting with lawmakers behind closed doors to sway holdouts.

title: Trump wants $175 billion for 'Golden Dome' missile defense
shortDescription: "It's a generational investment in the security of America and Americans," Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth said.

title: Why is Trump suing CBS? What to know after network leaders quit
shortDescription: Donald Trump has long bemoaned 'fake news.' He sued CBS for $20 billion over a "60 Minutes" interview with Kamala Harris. Now Wendy McMahon is out.

title: What is the ‘Take it Down Act?’ Melania Trump helped deepfake bill pass
shortDescription: Trump signed the Take it Down Act into law May 19, 2025. What to know about the “revenge porn” law and first lady Melania Trump, who advocated for it

title: Kids take over White House briefing
shortDescription: The White House welcomed children of reporters who make up the White House press corps and White House staff to the press briefing room.

title: 'How many people has he fired?' young girl asks Trump press secretary
shortDescription: Trump secretary Karoline Leavitt answered questions from kids about Trump's favorite food, whether he liked hugs ‒ and how many people he'd fired.

title: Kristi Noem botches definition of 'habeas corpus' at Senate hearing
shortDescription: Department of Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem couldn't define a key constitutional right when asked about it at Senate hearing.

title: Trump says Kentucky Republican 'should be voted out of office'
shortDescription: One of the few Republican lawmakers willing to buck Donald Trump received the cold shoulder from the president on Tuesday.

title: 'Don't f--- around with Medicaid,' Trump warns House Republicans
shortDescription: Trump warned the right flank of House Republicans not to touch Medicaid any further as tried to rally Republicans behind his "big, beautiful bill."

title: Biden book 'Original Sin' reveals frailties as oldest serving president
shortDescription: A new book about former President Joe Biden called "Original Sin" describes how aides limited his work and access to aides as he became frailer.

title: Trump says Russia, Ukraine talks to begin 'immediately' | The Excerpt
shortDescription: President Donald Trump signs a 'revenge porn' ban. Plus, the family of January 6 rioter Ashli Babbitt will get $5 million. It's all on The Excerpt.

title: Daily Briefing: Trump's tax bill and your wallet
shortDescription: Trump says it will help all Americans — studies say low earners would pay the price. Here is the news to know on tuesday.

title: Qatar dismisses concerns over offer of aircraft to Trump
shortDescription: Qatar dismissed concerns about its offer to give Trump a plane, a day after a bill was introduced in the Senate to prevent a foreign aircraft operating as Air Force One.

title: The untold story of President Biden's silent battle with prostate cancer
shortDescription: Doctors not involved in Biden's care said his diagnoses shows the challenges of screening for prostate cancer.

title: Trump admin terminates $60 million in Harvard grants over alleged antisemitism
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's administration has frozen or ended federal grants and contracts for the university worth nearly $3 billion in recent weeks.

title: Senate confirms Jared Kushner's father as ambassador to France
shortDescription: The Senate on Monday confirmed Charles Kushner, the father of Trump's son-in-law Jared Kushner, to be U.S. ambassador to France and Monaco.

title: Trump, Putin talk peace with Ukraine
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said after a two-hour call with Vladimir Putin that peace talks would begin “immediately" between Russia and Ukraine.

title: Trump wants probe into celebs who endorsed Harris
shortDescription: President Trump alleged without evidence that Beyonce, Bruce Springsteen, Oprah Winfrey and others were paid to publicly support Kamala Harris.
